title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park          Fort Stanwix National Monument offers an interesting variety of ways to support the Park. The Eastern National bookstore works in cooperation with the park to support school programming. Or you can become a Fort Stanwix VIP or volunteer; an invaluable part of any National Park Service site.   If you would like to support the park through a donation, please use the following link on the park website: Donate
